forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 8C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 46F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 37F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low around 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High around 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 37F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High around 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 41F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers mainly during the evening. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers mainly during the evening. Low 29F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 36F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High near 35F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low near 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early. A few snow showers developing later in the day. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few snow showers during the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow flurries and snow showers. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow flurries and snow showers, especially overnight hours. Low 28F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.
